original_text: Out of him came forth the corner, out of him the nail, out of him the battle bow, out of him every oppressor together.
korean_text: 모퉁잇돌이 그에게서, 말뚝이 그에게서, 싸우는 활이 그에게서, 권세 잡은 자가 다 일제히 그에게서 나와서

sentences.original_text: Out of him came forth the corner
out of him the battle bow
out of him every oppressor together
